subtitle: scary moments for customers inside of a
local McDonald's police were called to a
McDonald's on Saratoga near Weber just
last night to the report of a shirtless
man inside holding a knife and yelling
at customers the man was arrested after
officers were able to convince him to
lay down his knife and after the
incident luckily no one was hurt but
that man has now been identified as
36-year-old Patrick Christopher Durkin
he's charged with robbery and aggravated
assault with a deadly weapon I went into
the McDonald's as a cry for help I
couldn't take anymore I was absolutely
broken in every way I felt like I was
going to die and I had my shirt off some
swim trunks on the houses just
demolished I woke up and I looked over
and I saw a big blade a kitchen knife
sitting on one of the the old uh
nightstands and I verbally said this
ends now and I walked down to a fast
food restaurant and I poked my head into
the door I told him this is not a
robbery everybody get out of here there
was four employees they ran out the back
door I threw the knife on the floor
walked around
